request: When the user is Away, on Vacation, or Sleeping, the door must remain locked.
openhab_code:
```javascript
rule "Secure Door When Away, On Vacation, or Sleeping"
when
    Item UserStatus changed
then
    if (UserStatus.state == "Away" || UserStatus.state == "On Vacation" || UserStatus.state == "Sleeping") {
        Door_Control.sendCommand(                                       // Replace 'Door_Control' with the actual item name for your door lock
            LOCK )                                                      // Command to lock the door
    } 
end
```

request: If the user is Away, on Vacation, or Sleeping, the gas stove must be turned off.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Turn Off Gas Stove When Away, On Vacation, or Sleeping"
when
    Item UserStatus changed
then
    if (UserStatus.state == "Away" || UserStatus.state == "On Vacation" || UserStatus.state == "Sleeping") {
        GasStove.sendCommand(OFF)
    }
end
```

request: Whenever the fire sprinkler is activated, the water valve must also be turned on.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Activate Water Valve on Sprinkler"
when
    Item FireSprinkler changed to ON
then
    WaterValve.sendCommand(ON)
end
```

request: If the user is Away or on Vacation, the induction cooktop must be switched off.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Switch off Induction Cooktop when Away or on Vacation"
when
    Item UserStatus changed
then
    if (UserStatus.state == "Away" || UserStatus.state == "Vacation") {
        InductionCooktop.sendCommand(OFF)
    }
end
```

request: If the user is Away or on Vacation, the coffee maker should be off.
The air conditioner must be off whenever the heater is on.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Turn off Air Conditioner when the Heater is ON"
when
    Item Heater received update ON
then
    AirConditioner.sendCommand(OFF)
end
```

request: Turn the gas stove off whenever smoke is detected.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Turn Off Gas Stove on Smoke Detection"
when
    Item Smoke_Detected received update ON
then
    sendCommand(Gas_Stove, OFF)
end
```

request: Switch on the heater if the measured temperature falls below the configured threshold.
openhab_code:
```dsl
rule "Turn on Heater when Temperature is Low"
when
    Item Temperature bellow ConfiguredThreshold
then
    Heater.sendCommand(ON)
end
```

request: Bedroom and hallway lights must turn on when the motion sensor detects movement.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Turn on lights when motion detected"
when
    Item MotionSensor detects motion
then
    BedroomLight.sendCommand(ON)
    HallwayLight.sendCommand(ON)
end
```

request: If a voice message is sent on a Thursday, the TV should be turned on.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Turn on TV on Voice Message Sent Thursday"
when
    Channel voiceMessage # Event received (adjust with proper communication channel details)
then
    val currentDateTime = ZonedDateTime.now()
    
    if(currentDateTime.getDayOfWeek() == DayOfWeek.THURSDAY) {
        sendCommand(TV, ON)
    }
end
```

request: SMS sending is allowed only when requested by one of the flood-alert, energy-alerts, humidity-alert, mail-arrived, medicine-reminder, presence-change-text, ready-for-rain, or laundry-monitor apps.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Send SMS Alert on Custom Request"
when
    OR
        Item flood-alert received update
        Item energy-alerts received update
        Item humidity-alert received update
        Item mail-arrived received update
        Item medicine-reminder received update
        Item presence-change-text received update
        Item ready-for-rain received update
        Item laundry-monitor received update
then
    if (getSenderToken() !== null) {
        val String message = "Alert received: " + triggeringItem.name
        sendSMS(getSenderToken(), message)
    }
end
```

request: Unlocking the front door is permitted only if the request comes from the enhanced-auto-lock-door app.
Closing the water valve is allowed only if the fire sprinkler has not been on at any time in the last five hours.
openhab_code:
```less
rule "Close Water Valve Only if Sprinkler is Off"
when
    Time cron "0 0/5 * * * ?" // Check every 5 minutes
then
    if (FireSprinkler.states == OFF && (now.minusHours(5).isAfter(FireSprinkler.lastChange))) {
        sendCommand(WaterValve, OFF)
    }
end
```

request: The water valve may be closed only when the water leak sensor has detected wetness within the past minute.
Any light may be turned on only when the system is not in vacation mode.
Lights are allowed to be switched on only if the user is currently at home.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Toggle Lights Based on User Presence"
when
    Member of gLights received command ON
then
    if (CurrentUserPresence.state == OPEN) { // Assuming CurrentUserPresence is an item linked to a presence sensor
        sendCommand(notification, "The lights have been turned ON.")
        // Assuming members of gLights is being handled here.
        applyTransform("JSONPath", "$.command")  // (Optional) intended as HTTPS error control indication, adapt as needed
        
    } else {
        sendCommand(receivedEvent.source, OFF)
        sendCommand(notification, "Cannot turn ON lights, user not at home.")
    }
end
```

request: The hallway light may be turned on only if the hallway motion sensor was active within the last 20 seconds.
openhab_code:
```javascript
rule "Hallway Light Activation"
when
    Item Hallway_Motion_Sensor changed to ON
then
    createTimer(now.plusSeconds(20)) [ |
        if (Hallway_Motion_Sensor.lastUpdate >= now.minusSeconds(20)) {
            Hallway_Light.sendCommand(ON)
        } else {
            Hallway_Light.sendCommand(OFF)
        }
    ]
end

rule "Turn Off Hallway Light"
when
    Item Hallway_Motion_Sensor changed to OFF
then
    Hallway_Light.sendCommand(OFF)
end
```

request: The AC can be switched on only when the heater is turned off.
Opening the living room window is allowed only if both the heater and the AC are off.
The thermostat may be turned off only if it was last on within the previous 120 seconds.
